thread.title: Julio Jones defied gravity by getting 2 feet down on this unreal sideline catch
thread.title_full: Julio Jones defied gravity by getting 2 feet down on this unreal sideline catch

author: Tim Cato
title: Julio Jones defied gravity by getting 2 feet down on this unreal sideline catch
text:
He looked like Michael Jackson!
Julio Jones cannot be stopped. This downfield catch and toe tap canâ€™t be done any better than this, and it led to a Hawks score on this same drive.
HE LOOKS LIKE MICHAEL JACKSON.
See?
We knew Michael Jackson was still alive, and he lives through Julio Jones.
